features.title: Chat Mode
features.description: New Chat Mode for focused conversation and lightweight tasks. Restricts code/file writing while supporting image generation and file viewing. Includes intelligent mode routing via Mode Inference.

features.title: Design Agent
features.description: Three-stage workflow agent (Intent → Planning → Execution) for enhanced design capabilities, enabling more structured and intentional project creation.

features.title: CoView - Share Screen & Talk to AI
features.description: Share your screen with AI for real-time collaborative viewing and analysis. AI can observe your workflow and provide contextual assistance.

features.title: Inspector
features.description: Session recording and analysis tool for debugging and improving AI interactions. Analyze conversation patterns and optimize your workflow.

features.title: Assets Management
features.description: New asset management system with upload, preview, batch download/delete capabilities. Includes video attachment support, storage capacity display, quota reminders, and thumbnail support.

features.title: Mobile Subscription
features.description: Mobile subscription support now available on iOS and Android, with web-compatible hybrid pages for FAQ, Compare Plans, Credits Usage and more.

features.title: GPT-5.2 Codex Support
features.description: Added support for GPT-5.2 Codex model with improved video understanding language support and optimized performance.

features.title: 7-Day Free Trial & YouBase Launch
features.description: Launched 7-day free trial program and YouBase promotional event. Redesigned subscription flow with new guidance popups and promotional campaign support for eligible members.

features.title: Redemption Code System
features.description: New redemption code management and usage system. Users can now redeem codes for subscription benefits.

features.title: TailwindCSS Support
features.description: YouWare now fully supports TailwindCSS for styling your projects. You can use Tailwind utility classes directly in your code for rapid, responsive design.

features.title: shadcn/ui Component Library
features.description: Integrated shadcn/ui component library, providing a set of beautifully designed, accessible components that you can copy and customize for your projects.

features.title: Three.js 3D Rendering
features.description: Added Three.js support for creating stunning 3D visualizations and interactive experiences directly within your YouWare projects.

features.title: Resolved subdomain handling in batch API requests
AI Integration Persistence
features.description: Content generated through AI integrations is now automatically stored in your project, making generated assets reusable and accessible for future edits.

features.title: Fixed an issue with project handoff causing unexpected compacting.
Improved repository push timing for better performance.
Fixed user remix success event tracking.
Third-Party Login
features.description: Now you can sign in to YouWare using your Apple, GitHub, or Twitter accounts for a faster, more convenient login experience.

features.title: Video Understanding
features.description: Enhanced video analysis capabilities with added audio understanding for more accurate and detailed insights from your video content.

features.title: Gemini 3 Flash
features.description: Now available as a model option, offering improved performance and cost efficiency for video compression and deep search capabilities.

features.title: GLM4.7
features.description: Parameter tuning and optimization for enhanced performance across various tasks.

features.title: MiniMax M2.1
features.description: Now available as a model option, focusing on real-world complex tasks with stronger multi-language coding and agent workflows.

features.title: Fixed URL style issues when navigating between multiple editor pages
Fixed password project filtering in personal pages
YouBase Beta is Now Open
features.description: YouBase Beta is here — a complete toolkit to add powerful backend features to your projects. Collect data, enable logins, manage user accounts, and store files securely with built-in authentication, database support, and real-time monitoring. Fast, reliable, and built to scale from day one.

features.title: Fixed streaming conversation issues where tables weren't properly recording user interaction states
Fixed Google Translate errors on the YouWare website
Custom Domain
features.description: Bind a custom domain to your project with guided DNS configuration. Perfect for creators who want to present a professional brand image with their own URL.

features.title: Video Understanding
features.description: All models now support video input processing, allowing you to create projects that can interpret and respond to video content.

features.title: Project Status Badge
features.description: See your project's publishing status directly in the editor, making it easier to track what's live and what's in draft.

features.title: GPT-5.2
features.description: Access OpenAI's most advanced model with enhanced reasoning capabilities for more complex creative tasks.

features.title: Fixed issues with large user input content handling
Optimized error messaging when switching gateways
Improved console logging and request processing
Enhanced Mobile Editor (mobile)
features.description: Added fullscreen preview button to the mobile editor.

features.title: Agent Suggestions (mobile)
features.description: Agent responses now include suggestion options to help guide your next steps.

features.title: Security Update
features.description: Updated our Next.js framework to address security vulnerabilities and ensure your data remains protected.

features.title: Claude Opus 4.5
features.description: Access Anthropic’s latest flagship model, Claude Opus 4.5, designed for complex research, long conversations, and multi-step automation tasks, with significantly improved overall reasoning and coding capabilities.

features.title: Fixed an issue where the subscription page would crash when switching cycles with Google Translate enabled
Fixed errors that could occur during fullscreen translation
Black Friday Annual Plan Offer
features.description: A new Black Friday promotion for the YouWare annual plan lets you secure full access at a lower yearly price, making long-term use more affordable.

features.title: Smoother Mobile Messaging
features.description: On mobile, you can now send a message and leave immediately while processing continues in the background, making quick check-ins and replies more convenient.

features.title: PDF Page Selection
features.description: The PDF tool now lets you select specific page ranges for conversion, so you can focus on exactly the content you need without processing an entire document.

features.title: Fixed layout and style issues on the create page to ensure a more consistent editing experience.
Fixed broken or missing images in the conversation list so uploaded pictures now display correctly.
Help Center
features.description: You can now visit the new Help Center to read documentation such as quick guides, feature introductions, and integration descriptions. If you have further questions, you can ask the community. For VIP members, dedicated support is also available.

features.title: MCP status cloud synchronization
features.description: The mobile version supports cloud synchronization of MCP tool status, with commonly used tools such as the Animation Library and Icon Library enabled by default. When creating across devices, tool configurations are automatically synchronized without the need for repeated setup.

features.title: Mobile editing experience upgrade
features.description: The editor now supports voice input, the project page is displayed in full screen by default, and link recognition for sharing is more intelligent. You can directly speak your modification requests to your phone, and the Agent will automatically help you modify the code, greatly improving mobile creation efficiency.

features.title: Comprehensive website performance boost
features.description: Optimized login state verification, data loading process, and static resource caching strategy, supporting progressive image rendering. Page loading speed has improved significantly, with a particularly noticeable enhancement in the mobile network experience.

features.title: Work sharing settings update
features.description: The project page now displays in full screen by default. When sharing a work, it will automatically be presented in its best form, providing the recipient with an immersive experience as soon as they open it, making your work more impactful.

features.title: Subscription benefits structure optimization
features.description: The cost-performance distinction between different tiers is now clearer, allowing you to choose the most suitable plan based on your level of creative activity.

features.title: GPT 5.1 series
features.description: Supports four versions—GPT 5.1 High, Fast, Codex, and Codex mini—and introduces a new Auto mode for intelligent selection. Automatically matches the optimal model for different scenarios, finding the best balance between speed and performance.

features.title: Gemini 3 Pro
features.description: Integrates Google’s latest flagship model, providing stronger capabilities for complex reasoning and long document processing. Especially suitable for project creation that requires in-depth analysis and multi-step planning.

features.title: Kimi K2 and MiniMax M2
features.description: Added Kimi K2 Reasoning (chain-of-thought model) and MiniMax M2 Stable, expanding model options. You can flexibly switch according to project characteristics and budget to gain a more diverse creative experience.

features.title: Fixed the issue of SSO page errors in the mobile login process.
Fixed the issue with reporting sequence in the Help Center and the display problem when Gemini returns a 429 error.
Credit Care
features.description: The industry’s first credit refund mechanism automatically refunds the credits consumed when an agent’s output quality does not meet expectations. This allows you to experiment and explore with confidence, without worrying about wasting credits on failed outputs.

features.title: Annual subscription
features.description: Supports annual subscriptions and flexible Pay-as-you-go payments, with a new Credits rollover benefit. Choose an annual plan for a better price—unused Credits will automatically roll over to the next month, giving your creative investment greater assurance.

features.title: Auto Fix
features.description: The Agent can now detect errors in the project in real time and automatically fix them without manual troubleshooting. When a problem is found, it proactively prompts and fixes it with one click, greatly reducing debugging time and making the creation process smoother.

features.title: Fixed the React project compilation exception and the Remix project revert failure issue.
Landing Page
features.description: A new landing page has been added, allowing non-logged-in users to see the landing page first. After logging in and initiating creation, users enter the create page, improving the new-user experience.

features.title: Agent creation speed optimization
features.description: By improving intent recognition, creation efficiency is enhanced. The Agent now prioritizes completing core pages and postponing secondary functions, allowing you to see the initial version faster and iterate.

features.title: Fixed the issue where the MCP tool list could not be displayed when there were more than 9 items.
Quick Remix Prompts
features.description:
You can now express your remix ideas instantly before entering the editor.
Replace images or text, try a new layout or theme, or add a new section directly from the Remix popup.

features.title: Share and Open on Mobile
features.description:
When you share a project, a short description is now automatically generated.
After copying the link, opening it in the app will take you straight to the project details page

features.title: Veo 3.1 Upgrade
features.description: Video generation now runs on Veo 3.1 for improved quality and stability.

features.title: Sora-2 & Sora-2-Pro Integration
features.description: Integrated both models for enhanced video generation capabilities.

features.title: Haiku 4.5 Model
features.description: Introduced the new Haiku 4.5 model.

features.title: Global Styling
features.description: Unified fonts and visuals for a smoother, more polished experience.

features.title: Editor Clarity
features.description: The Clear Chat option now allows you to reset conversation history, helping the Agent better focus on your current instruction.

features.title: Search Rerank System
features.description: Introduced a new remove action to improve diversity and accuracy in search results.

features.title: Terminology Update
features.description: Replaced "Build on this" with "Remix" across the platform for a more consistent creation language.

features.title: Mobile Notification
features.description: The latest iOS update introduces clearer notifications in Recent Tasks, making it easier to track ongoing and completed projects. The Search experience has been upgraded for faster, more accurate results, and Push Notifications now deliver updates more reliably across devices.

features.title: **Search and Recommendation System** Upgraded for greater accuracy and diversity. Project suggestions now show stronger textual relevance and wider content variety, helping creators discover projects that better match their goals and style.
Model Enhancement
features.description: Upgraded the GLM model to version 4.6, expanding the context window from 128k to 200k tokens while maintaining the same cost. Large-document and code-processing capabilities are now significantly improved.

features.title: Agent Admin Guidance
features.description: Added new Codex admin command support and GLM-4.5v configuration in the system prompt, strengthening instruction control and consistency.

features.title: Retry Mechanism
features.description: Enhanced the Agent’s retry system to handle network errors automatically. Refined error prompts and response logic to reduce delays and maintain a continuous interaction flow.

features.title: Fixed Agent loop issue in certain tasks.
Fixed mobile simulator vertical alignment in editor.
Fixed GIF compatibility issue with Compact Gemini 2.5 Pro.
YouWare Mobile App
features.description:
The YouWare mobile app is now available on both Android and iOS. It brings the full creative experience to mobile, allowing you to start projects from any idea using voice input, file uploads, and intelligent intent prediction. You can chat naturally to build, edit, and refine your apps without switching contexts or relying on complex tools.
The app includes in-chat editing, streaming continuation, and a new Recent Tasks tab that keeps active and completed projects organized in one place. The redesigned Home Feed highlights curated and verified projects, while Remix, Search, and cross-device Notifications make it easy to discover, iterate, and stay updated wherever you create.
With a unified interface and seamless performance across platforms, YouWare Mobile helps creators turn ideas into complete apps effortlessly, anytime and anywhere.

features.title: Code View
features.description: The editor has been redesigned with a cleaner interface and more intuitive workflow. You can now open Code View to browse your project’s complete code directly inside the workspace. All users can explore and inspect their project structure, while subscribers can edit and save changes instantly. The redesign makes development and iteration faster, clearer, and more connected.

features.title: Agent Model Switching
features.description: The Agent now supports GPT-5, GPT-5-Codex, and GLM 4.5 models. You can choose which model to use for each task based on your needs, whether for coding, design, or creative generation.

features.title: Project Appeal System
features.description: A new project appeal process enables creators to request reviews for restricted or flagged projects. This option appears only on restricted project pages.

features.title: Agent Performance
features.description: Resolved streaming text issues and enabled segmented real-time output. Optimized model prefill to cut latency by over 60%, added automatic retry for timeout cases, and improved Codex deployment with unified backend logic and APIs for more stable execution.

features.title: Editor Experience
features.description: Added draggable console resizing, quick access to “My Projects,” and refined chat layout for large screens. A new prompt below the input field highlights upgrade options and credit benefits.

features.title: Frontend Interaction
features.description: Non-logged-in users now receive a login prompt when accessing AI App pages. Mermaid diagrams support mouse zooming for easier inspection and control.

features.title: Fixed Android voice input start/stop issue.
Fixed Explore page video loading failure.
Creator Studio
features.description: Creator Studio adds a performance dashboard where you can view engagement and revenue data for your published projects. Qualified creators can withdraw their revenue directly. It brings all creative insights and income management into one simple view.

features.title: Template Library Expansion
features.description: The creation page now includes an expanded library of landing page templates designed for faster setup and deployment. Each template is optimized for remixing or direct download, reducing the time needed to build high-quality projects.

features.title: Compliance Center
features.description: A new compliance section in the Explore page sidebar consolidates documentation, guidelines, and policy references. It provides a clear and accessible space for teams to align with platform standards and maintain transparency.

features.title: Video Generation
features.description: Veo 3 now supports 9:16 vertical output, optimized for mobile and short-form video platforms.

features.title: Model Pricing
features.description: Reduced Veo 3 credit cost while maintaining the same generation quality.

features.title: Agent Performance
features.description: Improved task recognition and contextual understanding, reducing first-response latency and enhancing stability for long-image parsing.

features.title: Backend Storage
features.description: Increased file storage limit to **500MB**, ensuring smoother uploads and more reliable asset management.

features.title: Security
features.description: Strengthened authentication and identity verification for improved account protection.

features.title: Backend Domain
features.description: Migrated YouWare Backend to **youware.app** for better performance and compatibility.

features.title: MCP Key Reset
features.description: Expired MCP keys can now be reset directly to maintain continuous workflow without interruptions.

features.title: Fixed incomplete screenshots in shared project previews.
Fixed cover image refresh issue after Remix.
Visual Editing
features.description: You can now edit text, images, and styles directly within the project preview. All changes appear instantly, making visual adjustments smoother and reducing Credit usage during editing.

features.title: Task Credit Display
features.description: A real-time Credit tracker has been added to the editor. You can clearly see your usage as you work, giving you full control and transparency over Credit consumption.

features.title: Nano Banana Model
features.description: Integrated Nano Banana into AI App for stylized figurine-style generation, adding a new layer of creativity to visual design workflows.

features.title: Search Optimization
features.description: Added URL-based search for faster access to linked content.

features.title: Prompt Auto Completion
features.description: Added tech-stack context and framework recommendations. When a user clicks a suggestion, the cursor now automatically moves to the end of the input field.

features.title: Backend Quota
features.description: Free users are now granted one backend usage quota to explore backend features before subscribing.

features.title: Agent Design Support
features.description: Added landing page reference examples and improved model error detection to reduce generation failures.

features.title: Domain Migration
features.description: All project pages have migrated to **youware.app** for a unified experience.

features.title: Improved video generation stability and error handling.
Agent Suggested Actions
features.description: After each reply, the Agent now presents smart action buttons tailored to your context. Continue your workflow instantly by clicking, no typing needed.

features.title: Agent Clarification Questions
features.description: When the Agent isn't sure what you mean, it now asks clarifying questions to better understand your intent. This makes conversations more accurate and reduces errors before execution.

features.title: Veo 3 Model
features.description: Integrated the Veo 3 model into AI App, enabling high-quality video generation directly from text without any setup or additional cost.

features.title: MCP Tools
features.description: Added React animation libraries for smoother motion effects in web projects.

features.title: Prompt Prediction
features.description: Improved prompt behavior and URL interpretation for better system understanding.

features.title: Search Optimization
features.description: Refined space handling and partial matching to improve result accuracy.

features.title: Backend Consistency
features.description: Remixing backend-enabled projects is now disabled to prevent logic conflicts.

features.title: File Uploads
features.description: Expanded format support and increased the upload limit from **5MB → 20MB**.

features.title: Prompt Compliance
features.description: Added filtering to detect and block unsafe or non-compliant prompts when using Midjourney models.

features.title: Fixed incorrect triggering of backend quota notifications.
YouWare Backend MCP
features.description: The new backend system introduces built-in database, edge functions, and authentication. You can manage user data, avatars, and creator profiles directly within your project, enabling end-to-end app management inside YouWare.

features.title: Search Function
features.description: A new search feature lets you look up creators and projects directly from the platform, helping you find inspiration and connect more easily.

features.title: User Agreement
features.description: A dedicated user agreement page is now available in the site footer, providing clear access to YouWare’s terms and compliance details.

features.title: Agent Enhancements
features.description: Uploaded files are now automatically organized, and the Agent suggests cleanup when needed for better file management.

features.title: Backend Workflow
features.description: Added confirmation prompts before deleting backend-enabled projects and a grace period after subscription expiration to prevent sudden interruptions.

features.title: System Architecture
features.description: Strengthened backend structure for smoother video generation and long-running tasks.

features.title: Typography Update
features.description: Refreshed font design for a cleaner, more modern look.

features.title: Adjusted log levels and corrected error codes.
Fixed login issues on some mobile devices.
Fixed duplicate entries in search results.
Fixed tooltips not disappearing after exiting fullscreen mode.
React Support
features.description: YouWare now supports the React tech stack for project creation. You can build, edit, upload, and remix React projects, and switch freely between React and HTML modes using `/react_mode` and `/html_mode`. This enables more flexible development and seamless integration with modern front-end workflows.

features.title: Midjourney Model
features.description: Integrated Midjourney into AI App, supporting both text-to-image and image-to-image generation directly within YouWare.

features.title: GPT-5 Model
features.description: Added GPT-5 integration, bringing faster reasoning, stronger consistency, and more natural results across creative and technical tasks.

features.title: Agent Performance
features.description: Improved tool execution efficiency for up to 30% faster responses.

features.title: Model Invocation
features.description: You can now switch between AI models by mentioning them directly in chat.

features.title: Image Parsing
features.description: Enhanced recognition for images without file extensions.

features.title: Profile Enhancements
features.description: Your Credit balance is now displayed on your profile page.

features.title: File Uploads
features.description: Added support for `.json`, `.xml`, and `.yml` file formats.

features.title: MCP Tools
features.description: Default tools in AI App are now pre-installed and ready to use.

features.title: Terminology
features.description: Updated “Remix” to “Build on” for clearer meaning.

features.title: Fixed message continuity issue after login on the Create page.
Fixed migration problems with legacy blog posts.
Fixed incorrect link rewrites causing page redirection.
Plan Mode
features.description: A new `/plan` mode helps you organize ideas before execution. You can outline goals and steps directly in chat, turning your plans into structured actions when ready. This keeps exploration lightweight and prevents unnecessary edits during early brainstorming.

features.title: Blog Page Revamp
features.description: The blog page has been redesigned to include Blogs, How-to Guides, and User Stories, all in a unified layout. You can read tutorials and examples directly in project format, making it easier to learn and apply ideas in your own creations.

features.title: Credit Rewards
features.description: Credits can now be earned through engagement and community sharing. You receive additional Credits when sharing projects or inviting others, turning participation into tangible creative value.

features.title: Agent Execution
features.description: Improved long-context stability and added visible progress indicators during extended tasks to reduce interruptions.

features.title: File Uploads
features.description: Increased single-upload limit on the creation page to **100MB**.

features.title: Security Controls
features.description: Strengthened external request protections to enhance data safety.

features.title: Editor UX
features.description: Polished multi-error messaging for clearer troubleshooting.

features.title: Fixed arrow-key navigation causing page scroll jumps.
Fixed missing recommendation feed on project detail pages.
Fixed re-login requirement after refreshing the Create page.
Fixed Chrome translation conflict with Google sign-in.
Fixed Safari issue preventing subscription management.
Creator Badge
features.description: A *Founding Creator* badge is now displayed for early community members. You can show this badge on your profile and project pages, establishing credibility and recognition within the YouWare ecosystem.

features.title: Fullscreen View (Pro)
features.description: Pro users now have access to a fullscreen project display mode. You can showcase your work through a short link in a clean, distraction-free view designed for demos and presentations. This feature highlights professional quality and makes project showcasing more polished and exclusive.

features.title: Plugin Page
features.description: A new Plugin Page introduces official YouWare extensions you can browse and install directly within the platform. You can explore available tools in one place without manual setup, expanding your creative capabilities effortlessly.

features.title: Personalized Recommendations
features.description: Recommendation algorithms now personalize your homepage and project feeds. You’ll see content tailored to your interests, helping you discover more relevant projects and creators.

features.title: Google Imagen 4
features.description: Integrated Imagen 4 for higher-quality text-to-image generation within AI App.

features.title: Agent Initialization
features.description: Reduced first-response delay by 3 seconds and improved handling of complex multi-step requests.

features.title: Explore Page Loading
features.description: Faster project list rendering for smoother browsing.

features.title: Image Generation
features.description: Added PNG and transparent background support; improved editing for multi-image workflows.

features.title: File Management
features.description: Enhanced file recognition and reusability within projects.

features.title: Fixed duplicate content appearing in Prompt Prediction suggestions.
Fixed excessive memory usage under specific conditions.
AI App
features.description: AI App is now available as a complete space for building AI-powered tools. You can design, edit, and publish apps with generation built into the workflow, bringing your ideas from prototype to launch seamlessly within YouWare.

features.title: Explore Page & Project Redesign
features.description: The Explore page now introduces *Playground* for discovery, and project pages show related recommendations. You can browse, remix, and collaborate directly while exploring. Comments now support image uploads for richer discussion.

features.title: VS Code & Cursor Plugins
features.description: Official plugins for VS Code and Cursor are now available. You can publish projects to YouWare or retrieve share links directly from your IDE, streamlining your build and share process.

features.title: Prompt Prediction
features.description: Adjusted detection timing to reduce false triggers; fixed IME cursor jitter.

features.title: Supabase MCP
features.description: Optimized tool call flow to prevent context overload during large data operations.

features.title: Fixed recommendation logic on Explore page.
Subscription System & Credits
features.description: A new subscription and Credits system is now live. New users start with 500 free Credits. The Pro plan ($20/month) includes 3,000 Credits and access to original code downloads. Higher-tier plans let you purchase additional Credits based on your usage.

features.title: Stop Function
features.description: A Stop button lets you interrupt any ongoing process immediately. You can now halt long or unwanted generations to save time and Credits, maintaining full control of your workflow.

features.title: Agent Upgrade
features.description: The Agent now includes a To-do tool and improved Thinking logic. You can plan and coordinate complex multi-step tasks more clearly before execution, making automation more reliable.

features.title: Model Support
features.description: Added compatibility for **Kimi K2** and other non-visual models (via K2 configuration).

features.title: Tool Invocation
features.description: Reduced redundant Agent calls and improved selective execution for focused task handling.

features.title: Boost Optimization
features.description: Improved generation quality with smarter placeholder handling and cleaner default layouts. Boost now produces more accurate, well-structured results, making quick project creation faster and more reliable.

features.title: Fixed payment upgrade and subscription synchronization.
Fixed text overflow in Thinking outputs.
Tab Tab Prompt Completion
features.description: A new intelligent prompt completion system has been added to the creation page. You can receive live suggestions while typing and press **Tab** to accept a recommendation instantly. This makes writing faster, smoother, and more efficient.

features.title: LinkedIn Sharing
features.description: Projects can now be shared directly to LinkedIn. You can showcase your work to a wider audience and connect with more creators across professional networks.

features.title: Agent Optimization
features.description: Enhanced search capabilities and improved information retrieval before generation. Added parallel tool invocation for faster execution, better context management for large inputs, and refined retry logic for smoother, more reliable output.

features.title: Profile Display
features.description: Improved username visibility to avoid truncation and ensure a cleaner profile view.

features.title: Fixed missing share card entry after upload or first publish.
Optimized token logic to reduce limit overages.
Fixed unclickable “Upgrade” button on the homepage.
To-Do and Image Search
features.description: The Agent now supports a built-in to-do list and real-time image search API. You can plan tasks directly in chat and fetch reference visuals without leaving the workspace.

features.title: Chrome Push Notifications
features.description: Chrome push notifications are now supported. You can receive instant updates and stay informed even when working in other tabs.

features.title: Founder Badge
features.description: A unique founder badge has been added to identify YouWare’s founding team. It appears in comments and on personal pages, highlighting verified creators.

features.title: File Conversion
features.description: Added support for converting Word, PPT, and XLSX files into Markdown, and improved image parsing accuracy.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Expanded supported formats to include `.doc`, `.pptx`, `.txt`, `.epub`, and `.csv` among others.

features.title: System Prompt Refinement
features.description: Simplified and merged system prompts for clearer Agent behavior and increased request limits.

features.title: Fixed input overflow and IME jitter in the comment area.
Rebuilt comment module for a consistent PC and mobile experience.
Fixed Chrome push tooltip display when content is empty.
Fixed URL concatenation errors causing missing images.
Comments and Save
features.description: A new interaction system lets you comment on and save projects directly. You can join discussions with creators, keep track of works you like, and receive notifications when there are updates or replies.

features.title: Supabase MCP Integration
features.description: Supabase has been added as a managed backend, supporting leaderboards, comment systems, message boards, analytics panels, and authentication. You can now build richer, data-driven features inside your projects.

features.title: **Agent Optimization:**
features.description: Improved prompt handling and sub-agent communication for consistent task outcomes. Added follow-up guidance to clarify complex queries, refined retry logic for token overflow, and introduced a new memory file `YOUWARE.md` to improve multi-step context understanding.

features.title: Subscription Adjustment
features.description: The free-tier limit has been updated to **5 uses per month** for better resource balance.

features.title: Google One Tap Login
features.description: Google One Tap login is now supported. You can sign in securely and instantly without entering passwords.

features.title: Report Entry
features.description: A new report entry allows you to flag issues or inappropriate content directly from the interface, improving moderation feedback loops.

features.title: Prompt Cache
features.description: Prompt caching has been introduced. Repeated requests now use cached results, reducing generation time and saving Credits.

features.title: File Uploads
features.description: Added support for `.gif` and `.webp` formats in Explore page and editor uploads.

features.title: Tool Invocation Stability
features.description: Improved Agent tool-calling process for smoother, more reliable performance.

features.title: Sub-Agent System
features.description: Added sub-agents for specialized tasks like 0–1 creation and code generation, improving accuracy and efficiency.

features.title: Retry Logic
features.description: Enhanced retry behavior for failed or interrupted tasks to reduce unnecessary repetition.

features.title: Boost Prompt Localization
features.description: Boost generation now respects the project’s original language for more natural results.

features.title: Fixed network file saving errors and improved path detection.
Fixed reading failures for ultra-wide images.
Fixed inaccurate token records in sub-agent logs.
Editor Device Preview
features.description: The editor now supports switching between desktop and mobile canvas views. You can preview responsive layouts directly during creation, ensuring your design looks great across devices.

features.title: Project Settings
features.description: You can now edit a project’s URL, title, and custom name directly from its settings. Shared screenshots and previews can include personalized titles, helping your projects stand out with a unique identity.

features.title: Project Sharing
features.description: You can now share your projects as interactive cards. Shared links display project details and previews directly, making it easier for others to view and engage with your work.

features.title: Agent Optimization
features.description: Improved generation stability, automatic continuation for long content, and more accurate image recognition with clearer error messages. Enhanced context understanding across multiple rounds of creation.

features.title: Resource Loading
features.description: Moved asset hosting to CDN for faster, more stable project loading.

features.title: Editor Experience
features.description: Disabled “Publish” and “Share” during 0–1 generation and chat responses to avoid accidental interruptions.

features.title: File Uploads
features.description: Added clear warnings for oversized uploads and improved deploy error messaging.

features.title: Interaction Design
features.description: Expanded clickable area for avatars to improve navigation and usability.

features.title: Fixed avatar display issue for email-login users on the Explore page.
Fixed unavailable downloads after project publication.
Fixed incorrect language recognition in some Japanese projects.
Fixed multi-character password input bug on Windows.
Stream Continuation in Editor
features.description: The editor now supports stream continuation. You can refresh or re-enter during generation and seamlessly resume output from where it stopped, maintaining uninterrupted creative flow.

features.title: Affiliate Program
features.description: An Affiliate program has been launched with a dedicated landing page and tracking interface. You can now share referral links and earn rewards through the new affiliate dashboard.

features.title: Sharing
features.description: Added Telegram sharing support and refined link display in share dialogs for better presentation.

features.title: Network Stability
features.description: Enhanced long-link reconnection strategies for streaming tasks, improving reliability under unstable networks.

features.title: Agent Recovery
features.description: Added fallback logic to handle unmatched or abnormal cases automatically, reducing interruption rates.

features.title: Fixed homepage “Load More” issue for new users.
Fixed abnormal token usage caused by unspecified parameters during generation.
Fixed unavailable code download after publication.
Fixed double-tab opening issue on profile page.
Fixed repeated passcode prompts on www.youware.com domain.
Explore Page Categories
features.description: The Explore page now supports categorized browsing with titles and filters. You can sort and view projects by type — Landing Page, Game, Tool, or Dashboard — for faster discovery.

features.title: Random Project Discovery
features.description: A “Roll the Dice” button lets you explore a random project instantly. It’s a quick way to find inspiration and discover hidden gems across the community.

features.title: Retry Logic
features.description: Improved system stability when tasks fail or time out. The Agent now handles temporary errors and retries automatically, keeping long sessions smooth and uninterrupted.

features.title: Fixed missing parameters after domain redirects between `.so` and `.com`.
Fixed History page failing to load additional records.
Fixed duplicate project listings on the Explore page.
MCP Tool Support
features.description: The Agent now supports MCP tools for advanced integration and automation. You can extend project functionality through built-in API, and service connections without manual setup.

features.title: Attachment Uploads
features.description: Increased attachment limit per message from 5 to 20 files for more flexible uploads.

features.title: Attachment Display
features.description: Updated image attachment styling to single-row horizontal scrolling for better readability.

features.title: UI Behavior
features.description: Disabled background scrolling when pop-ups are open and refined scrollbar visuals in the editor.

features.title: Project Preview
features.description: Updated template project code and optimized the 0–1 project preview layout for a smoother visual experience.

features.title: Security Update
features.description: Added sensitive-content rejection rules in the system prompt and automatic detection for unsafe model outputs to ensure compliance.

features.title: Code Download
features.description: Introduced one-click code download, allowing users to export complete project source files for further development and deployment. This feature provides greater flexibility for external editing and version control.

features.title: Notification Center
features.description: Introduced a unified notification center that consolidates system messages and basic interaction alerts. It currently supports reaction notifications, helping users stay aware of feedback while keeping all important updates in one place.

features.title: Subscription Plans
features.description: Launched the initial version of the subscription system, offering tiered plans with different usage limits and access to premium features. This release establishes the foundation for scalable, sustainable product access.

features.title: Stability
features.description: The system now automatically retries tasks when an LLM timeout occurs and shows a live “retrying” indicator to reduce uncertainty and task interruptions.

features.title: User Experience
features.description: Improved avatar hover and click areas for easier access to profiles. Image loading failures now hide raw URLs, creating a cleaner interface.

features.title: Fixed UI layout on personal pages when no projects are present.
Fixed element-selection miscount in the editor’s upload limit.
Boost
features.description: Introduced the Boost feature, enabling one-click generation and design optimization. It streamlines the creation process by producing well-structured initial drafts, helping users move from concept to layout more efficiently.

features.title: Email Login
features.description: Email-based login is now supported. You can sign in securely without relying on third-party services, making account access simpler and more flexible.

features.title: Audio Upload Support
features.description: Audio uploads are now supported with built-in validation to prevent incorrect file reads or format issues. You can safely add audio files to your projects for richer experiences.

features.title: Stability
features.description: Improved system stability and error recovery to ensure long-running tasks complete smoothly without interruption.

features.title: Session Experience
features.description: Optimized memory handling in extended chats to prevent message duplication and improve continuity.

features.title: Editor Performance
features.description: Enhanced responsiveness when working with large or complex content for a smoother editing experience.

features.title: Localization
features.description: Improved multilingual adaptation with automatic browser language detection for a more localized interface.

features.title: Fixed truncated output in long generations.
Fixed parameter extraction errors in Think tool
Fixed duplicate rendering of chat attachments.
Reactions on Project
features.description: You can now react to projects with quick feedback options. This encourages lightweight interaction and makes engagement more expressive.

features.title: File Upload Enhancements
features.description: File uploads now support pasting, dragging, or dropping entire folders or multiple files directly into both the creation and editor pages. Managing assets is faster and more intuitive.

features.title: UI Updates
features.description: The interface has been refined with a new profile button, improved personal page highlights, and default avatar backgrounds, giving the workspace a more consistent and polished look.

features.title: Agent Optimization
features.description: Adopted a new message stream format for smoother outputs and fewer interruptions. Improved process logging for easier debugging.

features.title: Explore Page Logic
features.description: Filtered out low-value content for a cleaner, more relevant project feed.

features.title: UI Design
features.description: Updated 404 page layout and hover styles; improved username styling on personal pages.

features.title: Explore Page Feed
features.description: Updated sorting logic to prioritize popular and high-engagement projects, making the Explore page more relevant and dynamic.

features.title: Fixed incorrect Remix info display in 0→1 and Boost projects.
Fixed permission errors on Safari preview pages.
Fixed avatar and username update failures.
Fixed layout issues caused by overly long messages or email addresses.
Text to Website
features.description: YouWare officially launches as an AI-powered platform that turns text into complete websites effortlessly. This release introduces a natural-language building experience centered on an integrated creation flow where AI Roll, Chatbot Interaction, and Live Preview work seamlessly together. The AI Roll intelligently generates and refines project versions. Through Chatbot Interaction, you can adjust elements and iterate naturally within conversation. Meanwhile, Live Preview reflects every change instantly, letting you see results in real time for a smoother and more intuitive creative process.

features.title: HTML Upload & Deploy
features.description: You can now upload any HTML file directly to YouWare, and the AI agent will instantly deploy it as a live, shareable website. This makes it easy to bring existing templates online and continue refining them through natural conversation.

features.title: Remix Function
features.description: Remix lets you build upon existing projects or extract templates for reuse. You can remix shared works to accelerate your own creation process and spark new ideas.

features.title: User System
features.description: A complete account system is now available, including login, project management, and profile customization. It offers a unified workspace for creation and organization.

features.title: Passcode Protection
features.description: You can now protect projects with custom passcodes, ensuring secure sharing and privacy during collaboration.

features.title: UI and Experience
features.description: Initial interface design finalized for smooth and intuitive interactions.

features.title: Performance
features.description: Improved generation and rendering performance for consistent stability in everyday use.

features.title: Fixed registration and rendering compatibility issues during onboarding.
